name: Google User
text: Really love coming here to get a build your own pizza. They have vegan options. Which is awesome. Sometimes the line gets long, and it can be very crowded. Workers seem kinda young and inexperienced. Overall though, a great place to come for quality pizza with lots of options.

name: Vanessa Grimes
text: 5 stars all the way...with now, one exception. The poor choice of crust change for the gluten free option. They are switching to a cauliflower gluten free crust today. Which sounds great, EXCEPT, there is dairy in it. ‚Ä¶More

name: Traveling True-B
text: Love this place and by far my kids favorite pizza. We are here at least 2 times per month. I load up my build your own with 80 lbs of meats and veggies. They have to lose money on my pizza, but make up for it on the simple pies.

name: Lynn Reynolds
text: GREAT PIZZA! White sauce, 5 cheeses, cherry tomatoes, basil, crushed garlic...so incredibly fresh!  The staff is friendly too.  Love the BOGO coupons when they come out.  Xo

name: Jeffrey Williams
text: We went to Blaze Pizza for dinner, and enjoyed it. We each like specific things, but different things, so we opted for two "build-your-own" pizzas, one each. I like a lot of the veggies as well as some grilled chicken, and you can have some of everything if you want. It was very good. And we each had half a pizza left to take home. Nice!

name: Kat Manske
text: This is one of my granddaughter's and my favorite places to go. We each build our own pizzas, getting the sauces & toppings we like. I got sausage and black & green olives, while she got pepperoni, olives, onion and mushrooms. Besides soda, ‚Ä¶More

name: Regena Wolter
text: They changed prices and menu a bit. Not a fan of the dough knots. There is no description saying they are made with pesto, very disappointed. They rushed with the pizza's and service was not the best. Seems they are slacking. Not coming back.

name: Debbie Houser
text: Ordered two pizzas,  one was Gluten Free and they did an awesome job on both! They were SO tasty and cooked perfect.  I don't understand how anyone can put a negative review saying they screwed up making your pizzas. You literally watch as ‚Ä¶More

name: Queen LaSho Eds
text: First time here and I will come back again. I ordered a veggie pizza personalized. The veggies were fresh and the environment was decent.

name: ZT Dobs
text: This was our first visit to Blaze.  The keto crust was incredibly more delicious than I anticipated.  The staff was awesome and the experience was efficient; which is always a plus with kids.  We will be back frequently!

name: Lady Beth
text: Came in on a busy Friday night and could not have been more impressed. Staff was very busy but stayed friendly the entire time. Cory cooked my pizza perfect! Our family found our new Friday pizza place!

name: brandon h
text: Always on point.. go to for quick vegan pizza option. Staff were nice and accommodating.

name: Alissa De Marco
text: This is what we were handed tonight at Blaze Pizza in Waukesha. HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE. I have contacted corporate. The employee there should be fired immediately and the manager of the location should be fired for hiring such a poor employee. DO NOT GO HERE! This place is complete dirt.

name: Tricia Dombrowski
text: Fast friendly service. The atmosphere was very clean. I had a build your own pizza and it was absolutely delicious! I also tried the round dough bites and they were amazing! I'll definitely go back as well as letting people know how good it was and to give it a try!

name: roman c
text: Good Pizza made fire roasting oven puts a good char on the bottom of your crust also caramelizes parts of the cheese pretty good just takes a few seconds

name: Peter Warzynski
text: Quick bite create your own pizza. There, I summed it up on 5 words. If you don't like it then the only person you really have to blame is yourself. Also have healthy options including salad and a half pizza option. Spicy and veggie also ‚Ä¶More

name: Glitter Sparkles
text: I love a healthy GF pizza made fresh to my liking. I wish they would only serve organic toppings; then it would be fabulous! I split my pizza with one of our kids because it's plenty big.

name: Catie O'Donnell
text: Creating your own personal pizza is the best idea ever. They have fresh, tasty ingredients to make almost anything your heart desires. Hint: get the crushed garlic put on first and have them spread it around before putting on the sauce. You get garlic bread crust and it's amazing!

name: Anibal Viajes
text: The pizza is very good but the service is too slow

name: Joe Martis
text: There was a mistake of one of our pizzas and management, even though it seemed to be a technical glitch with the one ordering system, took care of making a new pizza for us in under 5 minutes.  Excellent customer service!  Thank you.  Will definitely be ordering again.

name: Sharon
text: Love to order my own individual toppings and SO fresh. Best pizza in the area!

name: Joel Schoenbeck
text: The build your own pizza is awesome.  Add what you want. We always end up with leftovers,  which are great the next day.

name: Jared Feder
text: Absolutely fantastic pizza for the price. The crust is amazing and the toppings are vast.

name: Kimberly Nickel
text: The pizza and treats were aswesome!!  The staff very friendly and patient!  Place was very clean, staff always busy working hard!!  Will be back!!

name: BlixZero
text: I really enjoy the ability to be able to personalize my own pizza and get a pizza that is still of great quality.

name: Nicholas Hoehl
text: Awesome pizza, awesome people, unfortunate acoustics!  Being able to pick your crust, sauce, toppings, seasonings and drizzles makes for a delicious, personal-sized pizza experience. A brilliant concept! We go here at least once a week so ‚Ä¶More

name: ann machacek
text: I love the crispy crust and the ability to choose toppings.  Nice staff.  The store has always been nice and clean.

name: Hanna hanners
text: This is my Absolute favorite pizza place around!!! Great flavor on the Red Vine, its topped off with oil and sea salt! The service is always fast, but sometimes the workers apply different amount of toppings on. Some days they take their ‚Ä¶More

name: Alyssa Carter
text: I am so happy they offer a keto crust!!! Yes it does taste different than a regular crust but for having hardly any carbs its delicious! Just wish they would put more toppings on, I ordered a two topping pizza and felt that there was ‚Ä¶More

name: MARIAH ESPINOZA
text: It‚Äôs the best homemade pizza I‚Äôve ever had. I‚Äôll most definitely be there again. Great employees and great Customer service

name: Mac Yerks
text: Super fast at making pizza!! And it tastes really good! I def approve and recommend if you've never had it before!

name: Kenn Anderson
text: Best make your own pizza place! Love the variety of toppings: goat cheese! Long line during mealtimes but enough seating so you can always find a place to sit.

name: Maggie W
text: Great place for design your own pizza at budget pricing.  Only downside is the wait time if you go during busy times.

name: Anne King
text: We saw the add on the Brewers game telecast and thought we'd try it.  We ordered the veggie pizza as it is described on the menu.  Delicious!  And fast too. One pie was enough for two to share IMHO.  But lots of people were eating a whole one by themselves.  We'll be back.

name: Jaime Jones
text: They asked my daughter if her pizza had enough cheese, it barely had any on it compared to the first 2 pizzas of or group, she replied I would like more they said we'll have to charge you for another topping.  She looked at me for approval ‚Ä¶More

name: Jon Windau
text: Love the concept of a build your own pizza place. You can get as many toppings as you'd like and they'll give you a bit more if you ask. Highly recommend adding goat cheese to your pizza!

name: arkatala prudhvi
text: I am a frequent visitor to this location. For approximately $11 I got 2 pizzas with unlimited toppings(BOGO offer) that taste like heaven, especially the pesto sauce base. I will defined be back. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jamie K
text: Great experience staff was so friendly

name: Terresa Williams
text: I tried the keto crust, was pretty crispy but had a mealy grainy texture. The keto crust I make at home tastes much better. But it was nice to have a keto option at a pizza place.

name: Matt Creagan
text: I came in today with my family for lunch it was busy when we came in. Julie was very nice and friendly and fast! JoJo was very friendly and upbeat when she checked us out at the register. When they called her name's to get our pizzas we ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Finley
text: I'm a big fan of this concept applied to pizza. It may be the best use of the build your own/assembly line style fast casual restaurant. I had the Meat Eater with pepperoni, meatballs and red onion. One of the best parts is you can add what ‚Ä¶More

name: Alex Palmer
text: Great pizza, great service!! Love the garlic doughknots too!

name: Dhwani Patel
text:
Favorite build your own style pizza place. The spicy red sauce is made very well. Lots of veggie and meat options to add to pizza.
Blood orange lemonade is the best of anywhere else I have tried it.

name: ariana greer
text: You lowdown. I spent forty dollars and received no napkins. Hot pepper flakes were added that I did not order, The food is cold and burned, I called to tell you except you all don‚Äôt answer the phone.

name: Amy Bauer
text: I love Blaze. They were the first "made-to-order, individual pizza place" in Milwaukee before all the competitors started popping up (at least as far as I know!). I feel like the prices are completely reasonable for the amount of pizza you ‚Ä¶More

name: Craig Nettles
text: Not as good as a regular pizza. It's definitely fast food. Pizza shouldn't be this fast

name: Diane Schroeder
text: We were hesitant heading into Blaze pizza. You never know what to expect with a new pizza place. We were astounded at how good the pizza was! Wow! They have a giant oven right in front where you can watch so it was entertaining.

name: Jennifer Mazza
text: Wow! What has happened to what used to be one of the best pizza experiences in the county? We walked out after getting a look at the absolute horrendous mess of the preparation area. One staff member tried to apologize while the others ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Farrow
text: Great pizza! Staff was awesome and friendly.

name: Christine M.
text: Choose your toppings while waiting in line, or order ahead online and pick up quickly if it's a busy lunchtime. Fast, even with a line at noon, their pizza is very good. $5 lunch special is a good deal. Great staff, clean place.

name: Mucciolo Tile
text: Good mid-priced pizza with minimal wait, they have just about everything you could want for pizza (sans deep dish) including good vegan options and even gorgonzola. They have a few budget deals including the limited time $5 Lunch Hack that ‚Ä¶More

name: Wyatt Padgett
text: Good food, friendly staff. All natural ingredients!!

name: Aaron Nickel
text: Great staff, came on Valentine's day during dinner.it was very busy and staff were fast and very friendly even with how stressful im sure it was

name: Matthew Bernard
text: This place is like Subway for pizza. The staff was very friendly and extremely helpful to us newbies. They give you your choice of toppings and then throw it in a wood fire oven. They're pretty thin pizzas, so you might be able to eat the ‚Ä¶More

name: Shari
text:
Loved this place!
Although, they don‚Äôt offer large pizzas in-store, it does seem to be cheaper than online. Which is a plus! ‚Ä¶More

name: Sujay Gandham
text: Good and affordable pizza. I like the build your own option.

name: Kris Strnad
text: Nice to have each person pick size and choices on pizza. Good salads

name: Steven Floyd
text: Great concept for smaller sized pizzas.  They are done in 5 minutes.  Choice of 3 crusts, 4 sauces, and 15-20 different toppings- your choice. Also have finishing sauces, if you desire.All for one price.  Plan to go back frequently.

name: Andy Feuling
text: This is one of the best Blaze Pizza spots I've been too. In comparison to the one on Oakland and the one in Bayshore, this spot is the ideal imagery of what a Blaze Pizza is. Friendly staff, great pizza, and a very well kept facility. I would highly recommend this place.

name: Heidinnar
text: I have a love hate relationship for this place. Last time I went In I absolutely hated it. This time was better. Food was good and got to us in a timely manner, however the lady at the register did not offer a receipt and while I was ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Taylor
text: Kinda good, but all pizza is thin crust. If you like that sort of thing this is a good place

name: Linda Engelhardt
text: Good food, fast and reasonable....can't get any better than that.  We have a family member who is celiac and they gave her order special treatment!  üòä

name: Julie Sweetnack
text: I want to send my gratitude to the employee, upon learning of the romaine lettuce recall, immediately pulled the salad off the line. Thank you for caring enough not to get the customers sick. What I would like to know however is why the ‚Ä¶More

name: Dan D
text: Great food, very fresh ingredients and doesn't weigh you down after eating. Good service and nice selection of sides and desserts.

name: Preston
text:
Blaze is like Subway for pizza.  Choose your fresh toppings and they make it for you in a matter of minutes.
Choose the spicy red sauce though.  The standard is a little bland.

name: Shannon Gagnon
text: Awesome pizza as usual. One thing that stood out on our first visit to this particular Blaze was the staff. All and I mean ALL of them were friendly,smiling,and helpful. When's the last time that has happened to you still a restaurant? I'd give this store an A+ tonight! 8/21/18

name: Jessie Schiller
text: Delicious pizza, staff could be friendlier

name: Daniel Finn
text: Great ingredients, great taste. Will be back!

name: Joseph Tew
text: Great custom made pizzas cooked in a stone fired oven. Quick, friendly and well-priced with great value for your dollar.

name: Melinda Odegard
text: I liked the pizza very much it was thin  and crisp  the workers were fast efficent and polite the pizza was excellent and had healthy choices I will be visiting them again soon

name: Joan Mortimer
text: Hard to beat this great pizza!  I always order my to be baked a little longer for a perfect crispy crust.  Great staff too!

name: Rick Sanchez is My Spirit Animal

text: Amazing pizzas,  can be busy on a Sunday around noon but amazing service and food

name: Elliot Barnes
text: Great staff but like mod crust a little more

name: Ed Zetting
text: Awesome service no matter how busy they are, pizza is made fresh and tastes great !!

name: Jessica Mallinus
text: Great pizza. BBQ chicken is a favorite. Delicious lemonades and Mango Fresca beverages are offered.

name: Kevin R
text: I got the $5 dollar lunch hack (1/2 of a pizza and a drink). It was nice because I didn't want a whole pizza for lunch. You can pretty much load up as many toppings as you want if you create your own pizza.

name: Viral Shah
text: Loved the subway style pizza place where you choose the sauce and toppings and wait for the pizza to get ready. Must try the pesto sauce as the base sauce. Also the spicy sauce is great and gives a real good flavor to the pizza. Overall a great place to go with family.

name: Mark S Muhammad
text: I love there pizza, very healthy and good for you

name: Marcos Candelaria
text: Amazing pizza. Quick Service and Friendly Greetings. Recommended.

name: Doug Wells
text: Great place for a group lunch/dinner or if you just want to pick it up for one person.  Good selection.  Be kind and stand off to the side your first time, let others order while you look at the selections.

name: Krista Konetzke
text: Very good food. Staff always seems really put out when you order gluten free. Clean restaurant with lots of seating.

name: Lee Hung Tran
text: Tried this place based on a recommendation. The concept is cool and the service is surprisingly fast (and good). My pizza came out hot and delicious. I think I got greedy and put too much toppings on so I'll ease up on that next time I'm in town.  Definitely going to take the family there in the near future.

name: Liza Blackburn
text: Its addictive!!!! Build your own pizza who wouldn't love this place.

name: Christina Wallhausser
text: Blaze is so tasty and fast! Great for lunch. I love that they don't charge extra for each topping. This location is super clean and the manager is so friendly and helpful. Keep up the great work!

name: Daniel Peterson
text: Good crisp thin crust pizza.  The spicy red sauce is great.

name: Michelle Fields
text: Pizza was good. Service was just okay. They sell beer for a beverage selection.  Their so called cooler wasn't giving any cold air to chill the. beer so we got room temperture beer. I asked if they had more in the back and she wasn't sure ( unclear response). I had to ask for a glass to put ice in, which was only a small 8 oz. kids cup.

name: Leslie Manske
text: Love this place! The staff was super friendly and helpful. My pizza was delicious and done to perfection. Very reasonably priced.

name: Deb Phelps
text: Pizza is always great,  customize as you would like! They offer seasonal toppings,  too - for spring/ summer it's roasted broccoli. In autumn/fall they had roasted squash.  Always fresh toppings.

name: Alissa D
text: DO NOT GO HERE! This place is awful.

name: SAVANNAH ESPINOZA
text: It‚Äôs the best homemade pizza I‚Äôve had yet!

name: Mary Hoffman
text: Very busy on a Friday for lunch at 12:45pm, but the wait time wasn't very long. My gluten free crust was done to perfection, very crispy, but not burnt. my cheeseless  pizza was wonderful with  sausage, mushrooms,  onion, roasted garlic  & spinach!

name: FREDDY PERRY
text: Great lunch! Great pizza! 1st time there and I am definitely going back.

name: Karen R
text: I got the veg out pizza and it was perfectly cooked and super delicious! The service was AMAZING, all the ladies were very sweet! I will definitely be coming back! :)

name: Robert Francisco
text: Good pizza. Friendly and attentive service. Enjoy grabbing a pizza for lunch but it can get a bit busy.

name: Becca MacCudden
text: Delicious, light crust and fresh ingredients.  Very good pizza and not terrible for you!

name: J. Anthony
text: Good and fast pizza, $5 Lunch Hack and Take Two with half pizza and a side salad make this a cost effective quality alternative to fast food. Would have been 5 stars but employees are a little anti-social.

name: J C
text: This place is BY FAR our favorite pizza spot.  Everything about the experience is fabulous.  Love the crust.  Love the spicy red sauce.  Love the topping selection.  The people are always super nice and patient when we're creating our pie.  Also, be sure to try the blood orange lemonade....yummy!

name: Josh Thingvold
text: Service was meh. For a not so busy lunch hour i was an awkward process to get my pizza ordered and paid for. The pizza itself was decent.

name: Dany Bosse
text: Great place ta have a custom pizza that taste good. My kids and I, love this place.

text: Fast, kind service! Made sure we were satisfied with everything through the entire process. Clean facilities. Good food. We will be back!

name: Timothy Rausch

text: Ordered 2 pizzas, one with arugala on top. First pizza was fine, but arugala was first forgotten, and then when added, half was brown and wilted. Asked for a remake. The other guest was done with their lunch by the time a remake was gotten to. Wasnt a good experience.

text: My Favorite for lunch..love to build my own pizza.

text: I love Blaze! Make your own huge pizza for 8 bucks. They have great options and I've never been disappointed.

text: Average pizza, good price, doesn't take much time start to finish. It's very noisy even during non peak hours because there is nothing to absorb sound. I would take the pizza to go if I wanted to talk with someone.

name: Mary Lawien
text: So good and fresh. Love their pizza.

text: We love this place! We go here every Sunday and any day that we both have off. The people are great very friendly and some even remember my name. Every time is great never a bad experience. Recommended it to everyone I know.

name: Devin Hagan
text: This pizza is worth every penny!  We were introduced to this pizza by word of mouth and tried it out the other day (we had the Red Vine pizza).  It was DELICIOUS!  Perfect size, fresh ingredients, and quickly prepared.  Blaze Pizza has definitely earned, and will continue to earn, our business.

name: Teresa Benson
text: Staff was nice. My first visit today. Tried the Green Stipe to go... I think dude went over the top with the pesto drizzle, was more of a douse. Was excited for thin crust fired pizza but disappointed with a spongy crust. Just a couple slices into it I gave up.

name: Merle Malterer
text: Over priced pizza and service

name: Tim Touchett
text: This place was great. Very fresh ingredients, nice staff, quick service, and delicious food. Customize your pizza anyway you want for one price.  For two specialty pizzas and one single topping pizza, i paid about $20. Go for the bbq chicken, it was awesome! Will defiantly be going back soon!

name: Rahul Talwalkar
text: Lame pizza. Been here multiple times. Every single time, the pizza is not fully baked, too much watery sauce, can't even pick up a slice without dripping all over the place. Will avoid this place if possible.

name: Daniel Hammond
text: Good pizza, like a sub way, but pizza and better..

name: joe mcgrew
text: Great pizzas. High quality fresh toppings with an awesome crust done in just minutes. Very good value too!

name: Madelyn Clarke

text: If you love pizza, this is the bomb.

name: Mary Hughes
text: I was in the neighborhood and feeling so very hungry.  I was going to drive home in heavy 5:00 traffic & keep alive by eating an energy bar, but I didn't have enough energy. It was as this low point that I spied the Blaze Pizza restaurant. ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Schmidt
text: Great food and the staff is wonderful. Very pleased with my experiences dining in.

name: Padmanabha V
text: Build your own pizza with lot of toppings

name: Tim King
text: Fantastic place for lunch or dinner.   I come here almost weekly for lunch.   They are fast and super friendly.   Reasonably priced and very clean as well.

text: Is this the Subway of pizzas, or the Chipotle of pizza? None of these apologies seem apt. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Rodriguez
text: Excellent value and great tasting pizza. Can get pretty crowded but by the time you order something usually clears up. It does also get loud with plenty of people and families.

name: Emily Wilsburg
text: I don't do reviews but felt i needed to after visiting Blaze in Brookfield. I came in and Jackie was so friendly smiling and immediately asked if i had ever been there before i haven't. Usually i went to MOD but havent been happy with them ‚Ä¶More

name: Al C
text: Innovative new fast food style pizza. Where else on earth can you get pizza served to you in 5 minutes fresh off the counter? The ingredients are fresh and the taste is amazing. Not to mention their prices which make it a steal. Sooooo good!

name: E Auden Krauska
text: Absolutely fantastic! As someone who is vegan, I often dread going out for pizza because it means getting something very plain. However, they had tons of really great options and very fresh daiya cheese. The employees were extremely helpful ‚Ä¶More

name: elorbany2000
text: Very small size,  overburnt pizza.  Do yourself a favor,  do not even think of trying it.  Lots cheaper pizza place can serve you with a warmer,  bigger,  and more delicious pizza

name: Brian Blake
text: Fantastic food at a great price. Fast fresh and hot. It's just NOISY.

name: Bryana Becker
text: This place gets packed and the people who work there get them out quick. Plus the pizza is delicious so if i have to wait a bit longer I'm fine.

name: Daryl Clasen

name: james wilson
text: Great fire stone pizza, awesome staff think pizza artist it does get busy so you might want to preorder via there app if crunched for time.

name: A Johns
text: Pizza is consistently good. Wait time is ok.

text: Fell in love with Blaze on the east coast and was excited to see a few open up back home where I could introduce my family to this quick and affordable pizza chain.

text: If you love pizza, you need to try Blaze. Totally customizable pizzas made to order. Add whatever you'd like and they'll cook it up in a few minutes. Staff is always very nice and the pizza is delicious!
